name: @repo/monorepo
description: Monorepo skeleton for Rust, TypeScript, and Solidity development

scripts.setup: pnpm install && echo 'Note: Install Foundry (forge) separately via foundryup: https://book.getfoundry.sh/getting-started/installation'
scripts.build:all: turbo run build --no-daemon && (command -v cargo >/dev/null 2>&1 && cargo build --workspace || echo 'Skipping cargo build: cargo not installed') && (command -v forge >/dev/null 2>&1 && forge build --root contracts/evm || echo 'Skipping forge build: forge not installed')
scripts.dev:all: echo '使用 pnpm run start:web 或 start:admin/start:api 启动各应用预览'
